explains: vt. 施催眠术；迷住；以魅力迫使

sentences.en: I can feel that you mesmerize my heart.
sentences.cn: 我能感受到你在蛊惑我的心智。

sentences.en: He needs no bravado to mesmerize spectators.
sentences.cn: 他不需要虚张声势给观众催眠。

sentences.en: You can mesmerize anyone you meet with your cultured attitude and outlook.
sentences.cn: 凭你的修养态度，你能记住所有遇到的人。
